ResearchProjectDef.label: 20mm Flak 38
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 20mm autocannon based on 20mm Flak 38 AA gun. Uses 20x20mm magazine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 40mm Bofors M1
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 40mm autocannon based on M1 Bofors AA gun. Uses 4x40mm Ammo Clip and has an internal storage of 20 clips.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 30mm L21A1 RARDEN
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 30mm L21A1 Autocannon mounted inside a turret. Uses a 3x30mm Ammo clip and has an internal storage of 100 clips. Fires a burst of 6 shots at about 90 RPM fire rate. 1.5 Second cooldown between each bursts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 30mm Zwilingsflak MK103
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned double mounted 30mm MK103 Autocannon mounted inside a turret. Uses a German 30mm shell and has an internal storage of 200 shells. Firing at about 300 RPM.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 40mm M247
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned double mounted Bofors 40mm L/70 mounted inside an M247 turret. Uses the M811 shell and has an internal storage of 580 shells. Firing at about 600 RPM.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 37mm Flak M42
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 37mm autocannon based on 37mm Flak M42 AA gun. Uses belt-feed system with maximum ammo storage of 300 rounds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 20mm RH-202
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 20mm Rheinmetall Mk.20 RH-202 Autocannon. Uses belt-feed system with maximum ammo storage of 1250 rounds. Fires a burst of 10 rounds at 900 RPM, and cools down for 1.5 second between each bursts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 30mm 2A42 Shipunov
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 30mm 2A42 Shipunov Autocannon mounted in a BMP-2 Turret. Uses belt-feed system with maximum ammo storage of 500 rounds. Fires a burst of 8 rounds at about 514 RPM, and cools down for 0.5 second between each bursts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 25mm SIDAM 25
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned quad 25mm Oerlikon KBA Autocannon mounted in a SIDAM 25 Turret. Uses belt-feed system with maximum ammo storage of 600 rounds. Fires a burst of 80 rounds at about 1200 RPM, and cools down for 1 second between each bursts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: unmanned large autocannons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to research and build the unmanned variant of large autocannons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: unmanned 20mm Flak 38
ResearchProjectDef.description: An unmanned version of 20mm Flak 38 Turret which has a reduced max range and reduced accuracy.
